title: Senior Software Engineer (Full-stack & Mobile)
description: Build ETL pipelines for "Big Data" systems

title: Software Developer (Full-stack)
description: Worked as part of a scrum team to deliver new features and maintain both the front-end and back-end of Uberflip's main product

Wrote migration scripts for both MySQL and MongoDB databases
Wrote and maintain TestNG (Java) Acceptance Tests, and Jest (Javascript and Typescript) unit tests

title: Senior Software Engineer (Part-Time / Casual)
